Texts Surrounding Texts

All manuscripts Ancien fonds Ariel collection Burnouf collection Cordier collection Ducler collection Haas collection Reydellet collection Vinson collection

TST editor Quick palaeographer Tamil transliteration Sanskrit transliteration
Paratexts
Blessings Colophons Headers Invocations Ownership statements Satellite stanzas Tables of contents Titles TBC
XylothÃ¨que

Blessings

In the TST Project, we define a blessing as a short prose, regularly formulaic phrase, often written in the margins, which is meant to attract auspiciousness, but can also express a credo or reverence to a god or a spiritual master.
